  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/olivercolvile" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Oliver Colvile</a><span class="ProfileHeaderCard-badges"><a href="/help/verified" class="js-tooltip" target="_blank" title="Verified account" data-placement="right" rel="noopener"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></a></span>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/olivercolvile">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">olivercolvile</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Conservative candidate for Plymouth Sutton &amp; Devonport. I don't reply on casework/policy issues on social media. Please email oliver@olivercolvile.org</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              Plymouth

        </span>

  </a>

  <div class="SignupCallOut-subheader">
    Sign up now to get your own personalised timeline!
  </div>
  <div class="signup SignupForm&#10;  ">
  <a href="https://twitter.com/signup" role="button" class="EdgeButton EdgeButton--large EdgeButton--primary SignupForm-submit u-block js-signup " data-component="signup_callout" data-element="form">Sign up</a>
</div>

</div>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="870665668307365888" id="stream-item-tweet-870665668307365888" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;870665668307365888&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="869635193979768833" data-item-id="869635193979768833" data-permalink-path="/olivercolvile/status/869635193979768833" data-conversation-id="869635193979768833" data-tweet-nonce="869635193979768833-c383a91a-b911-4f29-98fe-ae4e48a4a8fe" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="olivercolvile" data-name="Oliver Colvile" data-user-id="399365200" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="garystreeterSWD" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;399365200&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;olivercolvile&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Oliver Colvile&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Oliver Colvile&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Oliver Colvile&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;4785228995&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;garystreeterSWD&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Gary Streeter MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Gary Streeter MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Gary Streeter MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/olivercolvile" data-user-id="399365200">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">How Corbyn does it:
Q. Do you condemn the IRA?
A. All bombing is wrong.
Q. Do you condemn anti Semitism?
A. All racism is wrong.<a href="https://t.co/sOKKJ4cvIr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jamescleverly/status/866554094177202176" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jamescleverly/status/866554094177202176"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jamescleverly/</span><span class="invisible">status/866554094177202176</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="865891822970818560" data-item-id="865891822970818560" data-permalink-path="/olivercolvile/status/865891822970818560" data-conversation-id="865891822970818560" data-tweet-nonce="865891822970818560-123f24ec-ba31-41e1-a827-c2ed7ee62561" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="olivercolvile" data-name="Oliver Colvile" data-user-id="399365200" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="theresa_may" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;399365200&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;olivercolvile&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Oliver Colvile&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Oliver Colvile&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Oliver Colvile&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;747807250819981312&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;theresa_may&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Theresa May&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Theresa May&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Theresa May&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/olivercolvile" data-user-id="399365200">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">If re-elected, I'll <a href="/hashtag/UniteAgainstDementia?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UniteAgainstDementia</b></a> with Plymouth Sutton and Devonport. Over 7 years I've worked closely with <a href="/PlymUni" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="49733413"><s>@</s><b>PlymUni</b></a> on <a href="/hashtag/Dementia?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Dementia</b></a>.</p>
</div>

</div>


    

    

  </div>

</div>
  



      
      

      

      

    </div>

  </div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">

    </div>

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>

  <ul>

  </div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/olivercolvile" data-user-id="399365200">

  </div>

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Guy Opperman</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>GuyOpperman</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  </div>

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">In awe tonight of <a href="/Tobias_Ellwood" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="482866177"><s>@</s><b>Tobias_Ellwood</b></a>, whose family has already been scarred by terrorism. He fought to save the attacked officer today.</p>

    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Went to watch Hamoaze House's show 'We Don't Do Perfect' this afternoon at the Theatre Royal, it was brilliant! well done to all involved.</p>
</div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">David Gauke Retweeted Oliver Colvile</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Very interested to learn about the ambitious Mayflower anniversary plans. As ever, <a href="/olivercolvile" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="399365200"><s>@</s><b>olivercolvile</b></a> a great advocate for Plymouth.<a href="https://t.co/jYResaOyOJ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/olivercolvile/status/836241020081721344" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/olivercolvile/status/836241020081721344"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/olivercolvile/</span><span class="invisible">status/836241020081721344</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">David Gauke added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/olivercolvile/status/836241020081721344" data-conversation-id="836241020081721344" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Read my monthly column for the <a href="/PlymouthHerald" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14224443"><s>@</s><b>PlymouthHerald</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/aI94lwQ3Ji" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.olivercolvile.org/news/view-westminster" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.olivercolvile.org/news/view-westminster"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">olivercolvile.org/news/view-west</span><span class="invisible">minster</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Each month Plymouth's MPs let us know what they've been up to. Here's <a href="/olivercolvile" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="399365200"><s>@</s><b>olivercolvile</b></a> on losing our military bases <a href="https://t.co/dho6Tozn5T" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://po.st/Yq5am7" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://po.st/Yq5am7"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">po.st/Yq5am7</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/ArYBEkU0ko" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ArYBEkU0ko</a></p>
</div>

        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>

  </button>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="834523178772881408" data-item-id="834523178772881408" data-permalink-path="/Giveitago1/status/834523178772881408" data-conversation-id="834523178772881408" data-tweet-nonce="834523178772881408-bfa86011-d117-4e04-b22b-7a8b6bc3f756" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="834671126471143424" data-retweeter="olivercolvile" data-screen-name="Giveitago1" data-name="Terri Portmann" data-user-id="525852801" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="campbellar BBCSpotlight CouncillorTudor olivercolvile" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;525852801&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Giveitago1&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Terri Portmann&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Terri Portmann&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Terri Portmann&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;399365200&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;olivercolvile&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Oliver Colvile&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Oliver Colvile&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Oliver Colvile&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;114862053&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;campbellar&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Adrian Campbell \u267b\ufe0f&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Adrian Campbell \u267b\ufe0f&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Adrian Campbell \u003cspan class=\&quot;Emoji Emoji--forLinks\&quot;   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I am very pleased that my long campaign to save the Albemarle Villas field in <a href="/hashtag/Plymouth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Plymouth</b></a> has been successful <a href="https://t.co/077Cnx2iGT" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.plymouthherald.co.uk/council-abandon-plans-to-turn-field-into-housing-after-public-outcry/story-30147109-detail/story.html#comments" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.plymouthherald.co.uk/council-abandon-plans-to-turn-field-into-housing-after-public-outcry/story-30147109-detail/story.html#comments"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">plymouthherald.co.uk/council-abando</span><span class="invisible">n-plans-to-turn-field-into-housing-after-public-outcry/story-30147109-detail/story.html#comments</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A pleasure to meet <a href="/olivercolvile" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="399365200"><s>@</s><b>olivercolvile</b></a> on our <a href="/LondonBoatShow" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="784337024245530624"><s>@</s><b>LondonBoatShow</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/LBS17?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LBS17</b></a> Stand today.       <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/olivercolvile" data-user-id="399365200">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Look out for ball 17 tonight to see who <a href="/Only1Argyle" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="234310676"><s>@</s><b>Only1Argyle</b></a> will hopefully play in the 4th round of the <a href="/EmiratesFACup" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4418429837"><s>@</s><b>EmiratesFACup</b></a>!<a href="https://t.co/BjrRzGQInL" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/38553260" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/38553260"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/sport/football</span><span class="invisible">/38553260</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

      <div class="modal-header">
        <h3 class="modal-title">Go to a person's profile</h3>

      <div class="modal-body">
        <div class="modal-inner">
          <form class="t1-form goto-user-form">

  <div aria-hidden="true" class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <div role="presentation" class="dropdown-inner js-typeahead-results"><ul role="presentation" class="typeahead-items typeahead-accounts social-context js-typeahead-accounts block0" style="display: none;">
  
  <li role="presentation" data-user-id="" data-user-screenname="" data-remote="true" data-score="" class="typeahead-item typeahead-account-item js-selectable">
    
    <a role="option" class="js-nav" data-query-source="typeahead_click" data-search-query="" data-ds="account">
      <div class="js-selectable typeahead-in-conversation hidden">
        <span class="Icon Icon--follower Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="typeahead-in-conversation-text">In this conversation</span>
      </div>
      <img class="avatar size32" alt="" />
      <span class="typeahead-user-item-info account-group">
        <span class="fullname"></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified js-verified hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span><span class="Icon Icon--protected js-protected hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Protected Tweets</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b></b></span>
      </span>
      <span class="typeahead-social-context"></span>
    </a>
  </li>

          </form>

        <button class="EdgeButton EdgeButton--tertiary u-floatLeft plain-btn UIWalkthrough-button js-previous-step">Back</button>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
